author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: ðeah hine nu se yfela      unrihtwisa
text.4: þeah he wæs on worulde      witena gehwelcum
text.5: on his lifdagum      lað and unweorð,
text.6: fierenfull.      Hwæt, se feond swa ðeah
text.8: Ne mæg ic þeah gehycgan      hwy him on hige þorfte
text.9: a ðy sæl wesan;      þeah hi sume hwile
text.11: næron hy ðy weorðran      witena ænegum.
text.12: ðeah hine se dysega      do to cyninge,
text.13: hu mæg þæt gesceadwis      scealc gereccan
text.14: þæt he him ðy selra      sie oððe þince?
